short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily locate turbo-frames with this simple developer tools for Turbo Frames

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool is meant to facilitate debugging Turbo Frames by highlighting <turbo-frame> HTML tags in the active page. If <turbo-frame> tags are present in the page, invoking the extension will highlight those tags with a red border and an identifier.

Inspired by this tweet by Matt Swanson: https://twitter.com/_swanson/status/1486482689741971463
